message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $130. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. I'm really interested in the product, but I have a budget to stick to.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I can't go as low as $100.  How about we meet in the middle at $115?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. I'm really interested in the product, but I'd like to get the best deal possible.
